data: mail-coach office | Falmouth | Mr. Stimcoe’s Academy for the Sons of Gentlemen | Delamere Terrace | Market Strand
Falmouth | Mr. Stimcoe’s Academy for the Sons of Gentlemen, No. 7, Delamere Terrace | Market Strand
July evening of the year 1813 | July 27

It was in the dusk of a July evening of the year 1813 (July 27, to be precise) that on my way back from the mail-coach office, Falmouth, to Mr. Stimcoe’s Academy for the Sons of Gentlemen, No. 7, Delamere Terrace, I first met Captain Coffin as he came, drunk and cursing, up the Market Strand, with a rabble of children at his heels.
